title: [FEATURE] Please re-add support for GRContextOptions
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

<!-- A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I need to do X, but the API is missing from the C# binding. -->

**Describe the solution you'd like**
It would be super nice if we could access some of the properties from:

https://github.com/google/skia/blob/master/include/gpu/GrContextOptions.h

particularly:

`fAvoidStencilBuffers`
`fRuntimeProgramCacheSize`
`fGlyphCacheTextureMaximumBytes`
`fAllowPathMaskCaching`
`fDoManualMipmapping`
`fBufferMapThreshold`

<!-- A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. -->

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

<!-- A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered. -->

**Additional context**

<!-- Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here. -->
This is part of my investigation into high memory usage when using skia with gpu backend.
